experience.description: Collaborated with faculty on stochastic modeling research, specifically focusing on the application of Monte Carlo simulations to value long-term insurance liabilities under fluctuating interest rates.

Conducted a quantitative analysis of predictive modeling techniques in property-casualty insurance, utilizing Generalized Linear Models (GLMs) to evaluate risk factors in large-scale historical claim datasets.
Performed rigorous statistical testing on mortality trend datasets to assess the impact of demographic shifts on pension fund solvency projections.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
